column4: OK 'nother audio issue, in Google Chrome, when watching youtube videos, not only is the video choppy (which i can ignore for now, but i don't know that solution either) but the audio is echy-laggy choppy as hell. any ideas?
install chromium
ok, lemme refrase that, in google CHROMIUM.  same issue (it is all chromeum, not chrome)
using beta or Dev or daily  ?
not certain...
where did you install it from
and also audio works fine in firefox?
i think via terminal, don't remember ( however that is a fairly certain i think)
havent used firefox, don't need / want to. uninstalled it too. :T
i take that back i USED to use firefox*
try this. sudo add-apt-repository ppa:chromium-daily/ppa;sudo apt-get update;sudo apt-get install chromium-browser
ok
done
I guess close chromium and start it again.
uhh, now its silent
i do not have sound on it now.
what now?
play anything in youtube and then right click on the volume icon in the top panel. click sound preferences and go to applications tab and if chromium is there
it is.
OK NOW I HAVE NO SOUND PERIOD.
solution? please?
now I can only say try google chrome?  http://www.google.com/chrome/eula.html?platform=linux_ubuntu_i386
